Various types of hyperlink targets
==================================

Clicking on this internal hyperlink will take us to the target_
below.

.. _target:

The hyperlink target above points to this paragraph.

.. _target1:
.. _target2:

The targets "target1" and "target2" are synonyms; they both
point to this paragraph.

.. _Python DOC-SIG mailing list archive:
.. _archive:
.. _Doc-SIG: http://mail.python.org/pipermail/doc-sig/

See the Python_ home page or the archive_ for info.

`Write to me`_ with your questions.

.. _Python: http://www.python.org
.. _Write to me: jdoe@example.com

.. _one-liner: http://docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html

.. _starts-on-this-line: http://
   docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html

.. _entirely-below:
   http://docutils.
   sourceforge.net/rst.html

This link_ refers to a file called ``underscore_``.

.. _link: underscore\_

.. _one: two_
.. _two: three_
.. _three:

.. _one-liner: `A HYPERLINK`_
.. _entirely-below:
   `a    hyperlink`_
.. _split: `A
   Hyperlink`_
